Description: Esp LTD Hetfield Signature Limited Edition Purple Snakebyte Baritone With COA #422. The guitar has only been played a few times and is in great shape. Beautiful purple finish on a flame maple top and snake inlay in the neck. Also loaded with the EMG Hetset. The strap buttons have been upgraded to Schaller strap locks and I will include those along with the original strap buttons. Also included is an original hard shell case and the Certificate Of Authenticity numbering this guitar as 422 of only 500 made. Shipping is for the U.S.A. only, sorry no international shipping. ESP LTD James Hetfield Snakebyte Baritone Electric Guitar Features: Replica of James Hetfield's axe that he played on Metallica's WorldWired Tour Baritone lower register suits a variety of harder-edged modern music styles 27" scale length allows down tuning while maintaining proper string tension and a great feel Ultra-comfortable thin “U” mahogany neck for fast playing and correct intonation Maple-topped mahogany yields an edgy, resonant tone EMG JH “HET” active humbuckers create a wall of sound with clarity and punch Stunning quilted maple top and eye-catching black hardware LTD locking tuners offer superior tuning stability Limited to 500 guitars produced worldwide
Title: Esp LTD Hetfield Signature Limited Purple Snakebyte Baritone With OHSC COA #422
